name: RE!GN
bio:
Influenced by a plethora of EDM genres, RE!GN is a Producer and DJ from Ewa Beach, Hawaii. Upon her recent graduation from Academy of Art University, she dedicates her time to refining her sound and learning about the industry. With a multifaceted musical background, she desires to express her passion for the music she loves, as well as make many lifelong memories and friends along the way. 
From May 2020 to May 2021, she was the first female resident DJ from the US on Da Hub Radio UK, introducing to the airwaves her profound love for heavy trap and bass elements in electronic music. Currently in Northern California, she is refining how she wants to express her emotions through her original productions, and is actively working as a Production Assistant for Sacramento -based events company “Pastel” since 2021.  In 2023 she joined as a new member of a San Francisco - based Producer and DJ collective:  “Dirty Not Sorry”.
